newsitem.title: JAPAN: Greenspan to hold news conference on Tuesday.
newsitem.headline: Greenspan to hold news conference on Tuesday.

text.p: U.S. Federal Reserve chairman Alan Greenspan will hold a news conference at 9.30 a.m. (0030 GMT) on Tuesday, the American Embassy said on Monday.
Greenspan is visiting Tokyo from November 17-19 at the invitation of the Bank of Japan, the embassy said in a statement.
